revised_title: The Asbestus Stone and Its Incombustible Cloth: Spinning and Manufacturing Techniques
tldr: The author describes the properties and various uses of the Asbestus Stone, including its ability to create an incombustible cloth. He provides detailed instructions on how to spin and weave the stone, as well as how to make paper from it. The author also discusses the best ways to preserve the cloth and other items made from the stone.
